live_updates: Services have been stabilized and the issue is now resolved. We thank you for your patience during the interruption.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
63761.summary: Some customers in Raymond are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
63761.title: July 9 - Raymond | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
